summary: #14 for the ship ask meme also hope you're having a great day!
question: #14 for the ship ask meme also hope you're having a great day!
answer:
Thank you!! I hope you are, too!

14. Name a ship that is timeless.

Snamione. I carry endless love for this ship, have for years, and don’t see that love ever dwindling. There are so many different avenues to read and write about them, whether it be genre, length, scope, etc., so I can’t see myself tiring of them anytime soon. 

Ship Ask Game

Tim works ridiculously hard and is totally ruthless at times
and all of Damian's ambitions come from Talia
give him some decent friends and watch him become defensive fluff
summary: If the Bat Brats are in a Harry Potter AU, which Hogwarts houses would they belong to?
question: If the Bat Brats are in a Harry Potter AU, which Hogwarts houses would they belong to?
answer:
Okay, so, I could swear I’ve answered this somewhere but for the life of me I can’t find it? (Maybe I just rant about it a lot in private?) So here we go.

I tend to really dislike the trends of where the boys tend to get assigned, and I think it has a lot to do with fanon versions of characters I find frankly inaccurate. I’m sure you’ve seen it. Hufflepuff!Dick, Gryffindor!Jason, Ravenclaw!Tim, and Slytherin!Damian. Sound familiar? (Not everyone, I’ve seen a few others, but this was all I saw for a long time.) Because the hugs! The angers! The smarts! The arrogant little bastard!

I kind of hate it. 

Give me a Slytherin Dick Grayson that’s charming and friendly and always has the right words for everyone. Who is wickedly good at spells and quidditch, always buried headfirst in whatever work he has, becomes Prefect in an easy victory, and is the golden boy of the Hogwarts staff. Who is smart and perceptive, and takes care of anyone around him lucky enough to earn his respect. Who is brutal when it comes to cutting down to size the people that don’t, or who dare to hurt the ones he cares about. Willing and fully capable of verbally tearing someone apart, reading people as well as he does.

Give me a Ravenclaw Jason Todd (if we go with post-death Jason characterization, which I prefer) that’s grumpy and mainly unapproachable. Who’s naturally gifted in spells and at the top of most classes, even if he’s got a hell of an attitude and likes to start debates in classes. Who is secretly still awestruck by this world of magic and spells and knowledge and eats up as much of it as he can, learning and perfecting and studying things just because he enjoys it. Who can usually be found in some isolated corner with a book or three, but best not mock him because he’s got a reputation for taking swings at bullies and isn’t remotely afraid of detention.

Give me a Slytherin Tim Drake that’s the actual Slytherin, picture-perfect model. Old family, old money, talented and whip-smart, and fucking ruthless when it comes to protecting what or who he cares about. Maybe he’s small and maybe he’s not physically threatening, but he knows all the little, subtle curses and bits of magic to ruin your day without getting caught. And he works at it, because it doesn’t come so naturally to him. Who stays up late and pushes and pushes to be better than all of his peers, to live up to what’s expected of him and - more importantly - what he expects from himself. (And yet somehow, his very closest friend is a Gryffindor.)

And lastly, give me a Hufflepuff Damian that never expected to be there. Whose whole family (yes I’m including Bruce) has been unquestionably Slytherin and always proud, and that’s what he expects to be. But he’s not. Who’s arrogant and antisocial, until he finds friends that don’t care what his name is, or treat him any differently for it. Who’s fiercely loyal to those friends, and secretly tender around all forms of life that aren’t human. Whose ambition and ruthlessness only comes from being told that’s what he had to want, and who softens and slowly accepts that he can take time and learn who he really is outside of an al Ghul or a Wayne, once he realizes that the people whose opinions he values will still care for him, no matter what house he’s in.

blog.description: The quotes are based on the characters from the game "Harry Potter: hogwarts mystery", because we can never have enough Harry Potter characters. Feel free to message me, submit something or send an ask about anything, except for pineapples. Tags are weird ok.

summary: Merula: In light of what you did for me... you can hug me for four to five seconds.   MC: Forty-five seconds?!   Merula: NO!...
body:
Merula: In light of what you did for me… you can hug me for four to five seconds.

MC: Forty-five seconds?!

Merula: NO! FOUR TO FIVE SECONDS!

summary: I actually feel sad when thinking about how Slytherins were mostly portrayed as bad and evil people when there are some death...
caption: I actually feel sad when thinking about how Slytherins were mostly portrayed as bad and evil people when there are some death eaters and you-know-who followers from other houses and schools. Slytherins aren’t always bad sometimes they just want to protect the ones they love, which drives them to do evil things. I love all the houses btw and im proud that slytherin is my house 💚🐍

summary: Lily Evans. (Part one out of four or five because y’all sleeping on the girls of the Marauder era) 		Favorite color is green...
body:
Lily Evans. (Part one out of four or five because y’all sleeping on the girls of the Marauder era)

  • Favorite color is green (duh).
  • Always wears a pair of little emerald earrings her mother gave her.
  • Ears turn red when she’s embarrassed.
  • Always has a peace sign up in pictures.
  • Uses pencils instead of quills. (”It’s so much easier!”)
  • Scribbles in a small leather bound diary every night. 
  • Loves sunflowers and daisies.
  • Listens to surprisingly hardcore rock music.
  • Never wears makeup.
  • Eyes light up when she’s happy.
  • Resting bitch face. (Like Sirius, and Remus.)
  • Doesn’t drink.
  • Would prefer to be outside than inside.
  • Loves the methodicalness of potionmaking. (It requires no thought, no concentration, just doing.)
  • Also likes History of Magic because it’s like reading a story, sometimes.
  • Prefers dogs over cats (but she’ll take either).
  • Converse!
  • Always has a pencil behind her ear/tangled in her hair.
  • Wears contacts (James thinks she’s even more adorable with glasses, though).
  • Lucky number is nine (on an unrelated note, James’ Quidditch number is nine).
  • Extremely unhealthy eater.
  • Writes fantasy. (“I have to write about it. I live in a literal fairytale, what am I supposed to do?”)
  • Kind of wants to be a journalist.
  • Gloria Steinem is her ~icon~
  • Kind of a hippie. 100% a feminist.
  • Turtlenecks. 
  • Yes, she has bangs. And no, she doesn’t regret it.
  • Kind to literally everyone. (She looks as if she’d be such a bitch.)

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends

blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Slytherin: Live fast, die young, and leave behind a pretty corpse. That’s what I always say.
Hufflepuff: You should say...
body:
Slytherin: Live fast, die young, and leave behind a pretty corpse. That’s what I always say.

Hufflepuff: You should say something else.

Hufflepuff: You should say something else.
trail.content:
Slytherin: Live fast, die young, and leave behind a pretty corpse. That’s what I always say.

Hufflepuff: You should say something else.

blog.name: potterswatching
blog.title: Nameless One
blog.description: A mix of multiple fandoms including: Harry Potter, The Raven Cycle, The Foxhole Court and the Shadowhunter Chronicles.

summary:
Severus Snape was a shit person but a great character. 
James Potter was a great person and a great character. 
They both went...
body:
Severus Snape was a shit person but a great character.

James Potter was a great person and a great character.

They both went through tremendous change and development. The difference: one got better the other got worse.

Plot twist: the good one was Jame Potter.

title: Fic Rec - HP
body:
Title: Breath of the Nundu

Author: corvusdraconis

Rating: T

Chapters: 14

Total Word Count: 191.798

Summary:  [HG/SS] AU/Crackfic: One morning, Severus Snape wakes up with a furry visitor snuggled under the quilt with him. As he pulls back the quilt, two glowing eyes lock with his, and everything is turned on its ear. As the rest of his visitor crawls out from under the covers, he realises he has a problem. There is a Nundu cub in his bed, and for some reason, she’s bound to him.

FF: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/11874602/1/Breath-of-the-Nundu

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

title: Trev the Bongo
body:
I spent a lot of my youth drawing (mostly spaceships and robots) and never got very good at it. I even tried to take Art A-level, but after a few months my tutor looked at my work and suggested, not unkindly, that I should skip the exam and simply enjoy myself.

I never really drew again after that.

But it seems to be a family thing: my Dad has always been good at painting and drawing, the Lovely…

View On WordPress
